column5: Luxury apartment walking distance to The Woodlands waterway, Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion for concerts, lots of shopping, lots of restaurants, movies and much more! 2 bedrooms and 2 full baths. Dining and living room. Kitchen. Washer/Dryer. Located on Second floor over looking pool. Garage parking with key fob safety. Exercise gym 24 hours. Business area with computers and printers. Free coffee each day. 1235 sq ft.
